Dear Perrier-Jouët Lover,
As a part of our Season of Gastronomy, we are partnering with prestigious contemporary restaurants in Singapore to provide exclusive monthly dinners, where you can experience the unique style of Perrier-Jouët Champagnes.
Here we are pleased to invite you to our exclusive club and blend charm and elegance into your daily life.
Please join us at http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_1701_PJ_MyPerrierJouet_Page_SignUp.html?cps=1&utm_source=cps-edm<[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_1701_PJ_MyPerrierJouet_Page_SignUp.html?cps=1&utm_source=cps-edm]]> to access special privileges and awards inclusive of
1) Champagne Event Calendar Access 2) Reservation before publication 3) Access to our Private Champagne Experiences
We look forward to seeing you soon,
Perrier-Jouët Team
